version_description:
- Liven Pay is here! You can now pay your bill with Liven. Your discount will be automatically applied as well.
- Liven is now available in 300+ venues in Melbourne and Sydney.
- We've added 3D touch quick actions.
- A number of bug fixes and performance tweaks were implemented.

**If you enjoy using Liven, please consider taking a few minutes to review our app.**

- Liven Pay is here! You can now pay your bill with Liven. Your discount will be automatically applied as well.
- Liven is now available in 300+ venues in Melbourne and Sydney.
- We've added 3D touch quick actions.
- A number of bug fixes and performance tweaks were implemented.

- Liven Pay is here! You can now pay your bill with Liven. Your discount will be automatically applied as well.
- Liven is now available in 300+ venues in Melbourne and Sydney.
- We've added 3D touch quick actions.
- A number of bug fixes and performance tweaks were implemented.

- Fixed a few minor UI issues.
- Minor performance tweaks were also implemented.

- Fixed the error where the user is asked to upgrade the app to the latest version even though the user is already running the latest version.
- Improved the location accuracy of the venues.

• Liven Cashback is here! You can now get instant Liven cashback everytime you pay your bill with Liven Pay.
• Liven is available in Melbourne and Sydney at more than 300 cafes and restaurants.
• We’ve also fixed a few bugs and implemented a number of performance and stability tweaks.

**If you enjoy dining out with Liven, please consider reviewing our app.**

- Liven Cashback is here! You can now get instant Liven cashback everytime you pay your bill with Liven Pay.
- Liven is available in Melbourne and Sydney at more than 300 venues.
- We’ve also fixed a few bugs and implemented a number of performance and stability tweaks.

If you enjoy dining out with Liven, please consider reviewing our app. **

- Liven Cashback is here! You can now get instant Liven cashback everytime you pay your bill with Liven Pay.
- Liven is available in Melbourne and Sydney at more than 300 venues.
- We’ve also fixed a few bugs and implemented a number of performance and stability tweaks.

If you enjoy dining out with Liven, please consider reviewing our app. **
修复已知问题，提高稳定性。

- We fixed a bug where new users were not receiving verification emails promptly.
- We also fixed an issue preventing some users from accessing off-peak promotions even though they were valid at the time of redemption.
- When requesting an Uber ride through the app, the Uber app now opens correctly.

**If you enjoy dining out with Liven, please consider reviewing our app. **

• Refer & Earn program is officially here! You can now earn more dining credit simply by referring your friends to have free meals using Liven!
• Liven is available in Melbourne and Sydney at more than 400 venues.
• We’ve also fixed a few bugs and implemented a number of performance and stability tweaks.

If you enjoy dining out with Liven, please consider reviewing our app.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Added a new "Liked" list for all your favourite venues
- Fixed a crash when you try to browse the venue lists while location setting is turned off
- Fixed an issue where the option to use the Liven Credit was hidden or unavailable for iPhone 4 and 4S
- Numerous other minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixed a critical bug where "Request Bill" was not responsive due to iOS 11.

MAJOR UPDATE

Meet Liven 4.0 - The Curation Update

This is one of our largest updates to date. Everything is cleaner, faster and smarter. Here are some of the new features helping you find restaurants, pay instantly, and earn Liven Cash.

QuickPay

LivenPay payments are now instant. Press the pay now button just once, and the vendor will charge you while you walk out. Just pay and leave.

Explore

We work with a lot of great restaurants, but it hasn't always been easy to tell if a place is right for you. We went and wrote a whole lot of mini guides to different cuisines, occasions, lifestyles, and locations so you can find the right places for you, relax when making plans, and have a more end-to-end experience using Liven.

The Location Genie

Ready to pay? We know. If you're in a venue, the location genie will ask you if you want to pay, and then you can press a button to do so. You save time, fiddle with your phone a whole lot less, and get on with your adventure.

Love it? Want more? Got suggestions? Let us know.

Happy eating!

4.0.1

Fix crash for iOS 9 users.

4.0

MAJOR UPDATE

Meet Liven 4.0 - The Curation Update

This is one of our largest updates to date. Everything is cleaner, faster and smarter. Here are some of the new features helping you find restaurants, pay instantly, and earn Liven Cash.

QuickPay

LivenPay payments are now instant. Press the pay now button just once, and the vendor will charge you while you walk out. Just pay and leave.

Explore

We work with a lot of great restaurants, but it hasn't always been easy to tell if a place is right for you. We went and wrote a whole lot of mini guides to different cuisines, occasions, lifestyles, and locations so you can find the right places for you, relax when making plans, and have a more end-to-end experience using Liven.

The Location Genie

Ready to pay? We know. If you're in a venue, the location genie will ask you if you want to pay, and then you can press a button to do so. You save time, fiddle with your phone a whole lot less, and get on with your adventure.

Love it? Want more? Got suggestions? Let us know.

Happy eating!

Liven 4.1

Grab this update for improved speed, function, and buglessness! We regularly tighten up the nuts and bolts to make sure Liven works as intended, every single time.

Let us know if you have any suggestion!

- Liven is now optimised for the new iPhone X
- Bugfixes and performances improvements
- 应用程序稳定性和错误修复

Wow! Liven is faster than ever! Zoooooooom!

Stay updated for the best digitally enhanced snacking experience.

Re-calibrating of the burgerometer, delineating the spaghettolog, increasing noodle consumption, and hashing browns.

Faster payments, squashed bugs, more personalisation.

We are listening to your feedback and working hard to improve your Liven experience. Here's what's new:
- Display list of venues promo code applies to
- Squashed bugs

If you enjoyed using Liven, please take a moment to give us a review. Thank you.

- Fixed a bug that caused app to crash for some user when applying promo code
- Other minor bug fixes

We are listening to your feedback and working hard to improve your Liven experience. If you enjoyed using Liven, please take a moment to give us a review.

- A whole new and redesigned Home screen layout to give enhanced Liven experience.
- A new Liven wallet screen that keeps everything neat.
- A few minor and major bug fixes as well as under the hood improvements.
- Fixes minor issues and app stability

- Fixed an issue that did not allow some user to claim referral credit
- Other minor fixes and refined user interface
Squashed few bugs and improved map navigation. Happy Liven!

Say hello to our biggest update yet.

LVN is Here:
The Digital Currency for Food is now yours to own, spend, and even send (spoiler alert)

New Home:
We re-jigged the home so you get a clearer picture of what’s on offer, and what the reward is.

Usernames:
Pick a username! Like a Twitter handle for your digital cash, go quick while the good ones are still out.

Send & Receive LVN:
Send LVN instantly to your friends by typing in their username. Use this to split a bill, settle a debt, or send a gift.

Stay up to date for the newest stuff and the best experience, and let us know what you want to see in the next update!

- Improved Liven Payment performance
- Fixed issue that asked some user for Phone verification when creating username handle
- Immediately update wallet balance when receive lvn from a friend
- Fixed a bug that did not send notification for some user on receive LVN
- Fixed few minor bugs

• Finding venues is now easier with the new map view.
• Transaction speed has significantly been improved.
• Fixed a few annoying bugs and made some additional performance tweaks.
- Minor fixes and performance enhancement

- Fixed but that did not let iOS9/10 user to login or sign up via email
- Other minor bug fixes

- Fixed unable to delete card
- Other minor UI and bug fixes

Merry Snaxmas! We’re launching some super exciting stuff for you in december, check the app inbox regularly for frenzies, mystery boxes, and sweet goodies.

Hey, you know how our referral gives you money for getting your friends to sign up, and that was kind of confusing and hard to use? Now, it’s like... heaps better, you get the money straight into your wallet, and we’ll let you know when your friends haven’t used the credit yet!

Also, bugs (as usual)

- Now chat with our customer support right from the app

- We fixed some annoying bugs and also improved the overall performance of the app
Hotfix to crashes accidentally introduced in the previous release
App stability and bug fixes
App stability and bug fixes

Welcome to Liven’s newest release.

New Navigation:
We’ve moved the map to the search bar for better discovery. We also moved the inbox out of the way and into your profile.

Better Maps:
We made our map more user-friendly!

Better Ready to Pay Button:
We made some improvements here and smoothened out the experience.

Of course, we've also had some minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Stay tuned for our upcoming releases and let us know what you want to see! Thanks for using Liven.

6.0.1 hotfix - Fixed a crash which may occur on the promo code screen

Bug fixes and enhancements

Welcome to Liven 7.0!

We’ve completely rebuilt our wallet to support some huge upcoming features! Coupled with a bunch of bug fixes in the app. We hope you enjoy our slick new wallet, send LVN and transaction history screens.

Remember that you can send the cryptocurrency you’ve earned to friends or colleagues in instant peer-to-peer transfer. Use this as a gift, split a bill or settle a debt. Just type in their username and dollar amount, and hit send.

Bug fixes:

Welcome to Liven 7.1

Now with Apple Pay! Skip adding your card on sign up and pay with confidence.

All you need to do is authorize the transaction and put the phone back in your pocket. The person behind the counter will take care of the rest.

Enhancements:
- Added ability to set default payment method directly from Wallet screen
- Added ability to delete card directly from Wallet screen
- Other Wallet design tweaks

Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements
We've sped up payments in this release!
This one's for new users, you'll be able to sign up and in to Liven with your Apple account in one easy step. We've also fixed some crashes

Hey Liveneers, today’s my big break (Keith the intern here) - Liven has finally let me write an app release. Firstly I’d like to thank my stomach for getting me this job. Turns out you can get a job by just “hanging out with your friends, not going to med school, and drinking Bubble Tea” so take that Mum & Dad …. anyway.. Uhh… here it is.

New To Liven:
Feeling lonely at night? Well there could be a sexy new RESTAURANT that just moved into your neighbourhood. This feature lets you see the new stores joining Liven every day near you.

Loading cues:
You know when you look at a screen, and you can see yourself looking at the screen through the reflection, and the angle makes your chin look like an ice cream scoop? No? Just me? Well we fixed that with a handy quick loading indicator that will distract me from this nightmare.

Swipe left on a restaurant to go back:
We didn’t think the world would get so good at swiping. It seems like the people finding me on dating apps however are not so adept at swiping right..

Prompts and Guides
We added shiny prompts and guides to make it easier for newbies… to you know… eat, pay and earn. Tbh my boss bought some reaaaaally expensive software to do ALL THE THINGS and that’s a lot of pressure for me you know? So I kept it simple for now and made it easier to go from not having a burger in your hands to having said burger. You’re welcome.

Home button switch
Tapping on the home tab from map view now … wait for it…. switches back to the home screen! I thought this was genius and they should give me a trophy. The team said it was kinda obvious and something about being a Snowflake. I don’t get it, So am I getting a trophy or not?

Fix tab bar bottom margin
Our navigation bar was off by a pixel or so and it caused so much OCD related stress our designer took a mental health month. For the sake of his sanity please update so we can get him back without any more PTSD

Fix favourite button layout on the merchant screen
Put the favourite button in a more thumb-friendly location after being laughed at for my tiny hands. A personal sacrifice so you can fav your best spots.

Christmas hat icon gone:
Removed the santa icon, cause it’s 2020 and all. This led to a 3 hour debate that polarised the office on what we should replace it with. We stopped for lunch and afterwards no one was hangry enough to care. Life pro tip: do all important decisions after food.

Our engineers are working hard for us to take over the world, one server update at a time, and this week they zeroed in on the home screen so that your experience is silky smooth.

Ahoy Liveneers, its Keith the Intern (who just passed his probation period). I’ve been given another chance at writing the app release. Long story short, I lost a bet that I could fit 13 Xiao Long Bao’s in my mouth at once.. And here I am…

Improved Wallet experience:
Like my local Yoga teacher, our app’s Wallet is extremely flexible. Unlike my local Yoga teacher, however, Liven will accompany me to dinner. Namaste Karen. So we’ve improved the way the Wallet swipes and animates for those that appreciate it! It makes you feel better, we promise.

New To Liven:
Feeling lonely at night? Well there could be a sexy new RESTAURANT that just moved into your neighbourhood. This feature lets you see the new stores joining Liven every day near you.

Loading cues:
You know when you look at a screen, and you can see yourself looking at the screen through the reflection, and the angle makes your chin look like an ice cream scoop? No? Just me? Well we fixed that with a handy quick loading indicator that will distract me from this nightmare.

Swipe left on a restaurant to go back:
We didn’t think the world would get so good at swiping. It seems like the people finding me on dating apps however are not so adept at swiping right..

Prompts and Guides:
We added shiny prompts and guides to make it easier for newbies… to you know… eat, pay and earn. Tbh my boss bought some reaaaaally expensive software to do ALL THE THINGS and that’s a lot of pressure for me you know? So I kept it simple for now and made it easier to go from not having a burger in your hands to having said burger. You’re welcome.

Home button switch:
Tapping on the home tab from map view now … wait for it…. switches back to the home screen! I thought this was genius and they should give me a trophy. The team said it was kinda obvious and something about being a Snowflake. I don’t get it, So am I getting a trophy or not?

Fix tab bar bottom margin:
Our navigation bar was off by a pixel or so and it caused so much OCD related stress our designer took a mental health month. For the sake of his sanity please update so we can get him back without any more PTSD.

Fix favourite button layout on the merchant screen:
Put the favourite button in a more thumb-friendly location after being laughed at for my tiny hands. A personal sacrifice so you can fav your best spots.

Performance improvements:
Our engineers are working hard for us to take over the world, one server update at a time, and this week they zeroed in on the home screen so that your experience is silky smooth.

The coolest thing about apps, is that you can go back into the code, and fix things that you wish you could’ve done better. If I was able to do that with my life, here would be my top 3 fixes:
- Realising sooner that you couldn’t put sunscreen on windows to stop getting burnt.
- Never ever posting my 4 hour Playwright “Life Sucks - a day from a Boba’s Perspective” on Youtube.
- Choosing not to play the cowbell, it’s not nearly as useful as my music teacher told me it would be.

Have a great LNY!
Keith The (unprobated) Intern

Keith The Intern here - We are currently pushing out updates like I drink a Bubble Tea (fast and every day). So sit back, and enjoy:

My Dad always told me, "Keith, it's all about who you know son". After 2 years of lukewarm handshakes and sweaty interactions at networking events, I disagreed with every bone in my body. Then I discovered Liven referral... Turns out I can make $10 worth of LVN from each of my 'connections'. Cheers for the dumplings, Kane from Assurance.

Improved referral:
We've simplified our referral process. All your friends need to do now is enter your referral code on their account screen in 'Promotions' or before payment on a restaurant's screen. Simple.
No more deep-linking or QR codes!

Always a pleasure, never a chore
-Keith

Ahoy Liveneers,

It’s Keith, the intern - back in your life like your junior school friend with a pyramid scheme. Our engineering team has been working hard in the background to deliver you the ultimate foodie experience on Liven. Skipping class to eat dumplings on Liven has never tasted so good (trust me).

The biggest revelation since someone decided to drop a tapioca ball in their perfectly fine tea, Liven has enabled users to pay with Union Pay!

Just like your friend who can’t stop posting gym selfies, Liven’s been “putting that work in, while y’all sleepin”... Basically we also fixed some bugs.

That’s a wrap (not a burrito). Enjoy the new releases.

Keith

Give someone a Bubble Tea, feed them for an hour - Give someone a Liven account, feed them for life ~ Excerpt from an Ancient Proverb.

Hey Liveneers! it’s Keith (The Intern), back to deliver you the latest app release notes. Our engineering team has been grinding hard (not unlike Pitbull in a music video), to bring users some top quality features.

Alipay Integration:
The biggest revelation since someone decided to drop a tapioca ball in their perfectly fine tea, Liven has enabled users to pay with their own Alipay & UnionPay accounts. This spells huge news for anyone who can’t be bothered dealing with multiple bank accounts. I can't even be bothered blinking sometimes, so this is right up my alley.

Bug Fixes:
This release we fixed a ton of things to make your experience even tastier.
What I love about software, is that you can fix bugs (things you could’ve done better). If that was the same as in real life, my GoT name would be something like:
Keith, of house Intern, breaker of notmyneighboursBMWwindow, Protector of tearsduringBambi, Khaleesi of my HECS, Drinker of non-expired milk. Instead, it’s the exact opposite.

As always, it’s been a pleasure. Reach out to support@liven.com.au with any questions or queries.

Keith, over and out.

Hey Liveneers, Keith (the Intern) here, but if you are what you eat - then you can call me Keith (the Purple Rice Yogurt). I’m here to deliver you news that's more exciting than an invitation to Hogwarts. Welcome to Liven 7.4.6!

Recommend a restaurant you want on Liven:

Choosing what restaurant to give our users next has always been a great point of debate in the Liven office. Just like The Bachelor giving out roses, this process always leaves someone disappointed. So we decided to let you help us out! Now you can hop into our feedback section, located in your profile and recommend specific stores that you’d love to see on Liven. After you’ve suggested, we will let you know when they are ready for your Liven wallet.

Give us your feedback:

You know that moment in the shower, when you think of a comment that would’ve been useful 4 weeks ago in a discussion? Happens to me all the time.. Well anyway, we have now allowed you to come back and drop us some feedback whenever you feel like it. We’d expect to see feedback like:
“I would sell my High School Diploma for 50LVN”
“Your app makes me feel like I’m ice skating on a frozen pond of Lemonade”
“The only thing more delicious than the food I ate, is the way your app moves under my thumb”

Keith, signing out.

Hey Liveneers! It’s Keith (The Intern), sending you all my wishes during this period. So far in isolation, I:

- Literally completed my streaming service.
- Didn’t move once for 29 hours.
- Had a first date over video chat, and accidentally put my date on mute.
- Tried to do Yoga and hurt my back (and my ego).

You can guess I have been looking for a silver lining, and the Liven team brought a big one this week. Introducing Liven 7.5.

Liven is now Take Away friendly!
The fact that you can’t sit down in your favourite store right now, shouldn’t deprive your stomach of such an essential service. Real foodies are still getting their fix, in the form of takeaway - and I’m right there with them. I never knew taking Bubble Tea back to my couch would be so fun, especially when it saves me so much money.

Purchase Care Packages through Liven:
Care Packages are now available for purchase inside the Liven app. You can save them up to pay for a big bonanza, or use them to pay for a take away in-between remote lectures that you are definitely paying attention to.

Double your money, Double your Love - Liven Care Package:
So get this, you buy say, a $50 Liven Care Package, and your favourite restaurant will throw in a tasty bonus! Think about it, you could be looking at double the dumplings for free. And you get to help your favourite restaurant through this challenging period. Boom!

Liven Guarantee
Risk isn’t usually something associated with food, unless you are eating my cooking. However, in this climate, Liven is committed to our users getting their value, regardless of the trading status of the venue you purchased credit at. Liven will guarantee the funds you have spent can be consumed as food thanks to our Premium Pledge Partners!

Save Your Faves
Besides filling your stomach, we have made this feature so that you can play a part in helping out your favourite restaurants. This feature is for the Bubble Tea store that gives you more pearls than they should’ve, or the Dumpling store who always serves your Xiao Long Bao’s extra hot. These brands work night and day, 7 days a week to satisfy you with their service, now is our time to show them our appreciation.

Pay with Liven, and Save your Faves while you do so.

Liven is now even more Take Away friendly!
The fact that you can’t sit down in your favourite store right now, shouldn’t deprive your stomach of such an essential service. Contactless pickup is even easier when you can pay from outside the store and don’t need to go near the payment terminal thanks to Liven. Real foodies are still getting their fix, in the form of takeaway - and I’m right there with them. I never knew taking Bubble Tea back to my couch would be so fun, especially when it saves me so much money.

Liven Guarantee
Risk isn’t usually something associated with food, unless you are eating my cooking. However, in this climate, Liven is committed to our users getting their money’s worth, regardless of the trading status of the venue you purchased credit at. Liven will guarantee the funds you have spent can be consumed as food at one of our Pledge Partner restaurants thanks to our Relief Fund!

Save Your Faves
Besides filling your stomach, we have made this feature so that you can play a part in helping out your favourite restaurants. This feature is for the Bubble Tea store that gives you more pearls than they should’ve, or the Dumpling spot who always serves your Xiao Long Bao’s extra hot. These #hospoheroes work night and day, 7 days a week to satisfy you with their service, now is our time to show them our appreciation.

Pay with Liven, and Save your Faves while you do so.

I never knew taking Bubble Tea back to my couch would be so fun, especially when it saves me so much money.

Purchase Care Packages through Liven:
Care Packages are now available for purchase inside the Liven app. You can save them up to pay for a big bonanza, or use them to pay for a take away in-between remote lectures that you are definitely paying attention to.

Double your money, Double your Love - Liven Care Package:
So get this, you buy say, a $50 Liven Care Package, and your favourite restaurant will throw in a tasty bonus! Think about it, you could be looking at double the dumplings for free. And you get to help your favourite restaurant through this challenging period. Boom!

Liven Guarantee
Risk isn’t usually something associated with food, unless you are eating my cooking. However, in this climate, Liven is committed to our users getting their money’s worth, regardless of the trading status of the venue you purchased credit at. Liven will guarantee the funds you have spent can be consumed as food at one of our Pledge Partner restaurants thanks to our Relief Fund!

Save Your Faves
Besides filling your stomach, we have made this feature so that you can play a part in helping out your favourite restaurants. This feature is for the Bubble Tea store that gives you more pearls than they should’ve, or the Dumpling spot who always serves your Xiao Long Bao’s extra hot. These #hospoheroes work night and day, 7 days a week to satisfy you with their service, now is our time to show them our appreciation.

Pay with Liven, and Save your Faves while you do so.

Hey Liveneers,

Keith (the intern) here to bring you updates that are hotter than the dance moves you secretly practice in the shower. So put down that book you were pretending to read, and make sure there’s no liquid in your mouth to spit out spontaneously, because here is Liven 7.5.3.

Suggest a Care Package Restaurant
We’ve seen huge success so far with our Care Packages. Having provided meaningful support to our partners, we have decided to open it up to the hospitality industry at large! You can now suggest a restaurant that isn’t yet on Liven (I use the term Muggle), and select an amount you would want to spend on a care package if they came on board. We will then get in touch and try to bring them on board. You can find this when your search results come back empty, on the home screen or on the profile screen.

Visualise Care Package Rates
Instead of making you hop around our Care Packages like a game of musical chairs, we decided to make things a bit easier for you to navigate. You can now see the maximum bonus rate that our proud partners are providing you when navigating Care Packages.

As always, it’s been a pleasure to guide you through the latest app release. I will now go back to my activity today of dressing up like I'm exercising, and then having a nap.

Additional Updates
- Added receipt to transaction history for Care Package purchases
- Added a section for restaurants offering $1 for $1 bought
- New receipt screen
- Updated Care Package transaction history to include the restaurant you bought from
- Updated Suggest a Restaurant look and feel

Ahoy Liveneers,

If you are here for the muffin baking competition, it’s down the hall to the left. If you are here for the app release notes, keep reading.

Keith The Intern here, bringing you your release notes as always. Historically, downloading free noods has always been a big no (especially in my house). That’s about to change with Liven 7.5.6.

Care Package Promotion
Just when you thought it can’t get any better, it has. You can now get promotions, on existing Liven Care Packages. This means you can literally get some for free. I was listening to my team explain this to me, and I couldn’t understand why we are just giving away free food. Seems like your next set of noods could be free.

How can I find these Promotions?
Another thing I learned about today, was what an influencer is. Turns out, we have a bunch of these influencers on our Instagram channel, that are going to help us give out this free food.

Where can I use these promotions?
When you apply a promotion, you can use it on any Liven Care Package that has a lightning bolt next to it (it looks pretty cool). I swear this has nothing to do with me recently watching Harry Potter again.

Stay tuned for more groovy updates.

Keith The Intern (trying to pivot to influencer)

Ahoy Liveneers! It's Keith (The Intern), back to serenade your tech tastebuds with some Liven App updates. You better take a seat and strap in because this update is going to shock you more than those Glow Up Challenges you can’t stop watching on TikTok.

Wallet Overhaul
You ever look in the mirror after you buy a new shirt, or get a haircut and think "DAMN". Well, this is exactly how we feel about our new wallet feature. Made to touch the stomach and hearts of our users, these are the new features of our wallet.

Fill Up Graphic
Whoever said you can have too much of a good thing, had obviously never heard of LVN. Your Liven wallet will now fill up with tasty food graphics, depending on how much LVN you have saved up. It will also empty some food from your wallet when you decide to spend LVN. The power is in your hands to decide how much you want to keep in there.

Loading Pulldown
If you thought 'making it rain' was reserved for Athletes or Wall Street, think again. When you go inside your Liven Balance, you can make it rain a variety of food by pulling down the loading screen. I haven't seen that much food since my last trip to Grandma's house.

Access Care Packages Quickly
Whether you are trying to view your existing Care Packages or buy new ones quickly - we have designed our new wallet for you. Alongside your LVN balance, you can now easily see your Care Packages. Think of it as a control center, for all things food payments.
Overall, we are ecstatic to bring you this new feature. You could even say we did a Glow Up Challenge ourselves ;) As always, we'd love to hear about your favourite features, or things you would like to see in the app.

Over and out,
Keith (The Intern)

Overall, we are ecstatic to bring you this new feature. You could even say we did a Glow Up Challenge ourselves ;) As always, we'd love to hear about your favourite features, or things you would like to see in the app.

Over and out,
Keith (The Intern)

We squashed some bugs in this version, nothing to see here! Or carry on with our previous release notes:

Ahoy Liveneers! It's Keith (The Intern), back to serenade your tech tastebuds with some Liven App updates. You better take a seat and strap in because this update is going to shock you more than those Glow Up Challenges you can’t stop watching on TikTok.

Wallet Overhaul
You ever look in the mirror after you buy a new shirt, or get a haircut and think "DAMN". Well, this is exactly how we feel about our new wallet feature. Made to touch the stomach and hearts of our users, these are the new features of our wallet.

Fill Up
Whoever said you can have too much of a good thing, had obviously never heard of LVN. Your Liven wallet will now fill up with tasty food, depending on how much LVN you have saved up. It will also empty some food from your wallet when you decide to spend LVN. The power is in your hands to decide how much you want to keep in there.

Access Care Packages Quickly
Whether you are trying to view your existing Care Packages or buy new ones quickly - we have designed our new wallet for you. Alongside your LVN balance, you can now easily see your Care Packages. Think of it as a control center, for all things food payments.
Overall, we are ecstatic to bring you this new feature. You could even say we did a Glow Up Challenge ourselves ;) As always, we'd love to hear about your favourite features, or things you would like to see in the app.

Over and out,
Keith (The Intern)

We added restaurant lists to the packages you buy, making it easier for you to see where you can use your package and pay. We also squashed some bugs in this version bump and made some minor improvements to the way things work. We hope you enjoy dining out and see you again in another update!
We've made some tweaks and squashed some bugs in this version.

Ahoy Liveneers,

Keith (the intern) here. The only thing more exciting towards the end of the calendar year than hearing Mariah Carey's song "All I Want for Christmas", is Liven's Pink Friday. Yep, you heard it right, we are back :D

For any newbies, Pink Friday is an annual event that starts on 27/11/20 and goes until after Cyber Monday. During which time, Liven restaurants give users unbelievable savings on both LVN Rewards, and Care Packages. Last year I had to be rolled around for 3 days due to my food intake.

We have added some cool new features for the big day:
- Follow the new Care Package banner on the home screen to find our Pink Friday specials
- Pink Friday packages have been highlighted so get em while they're hot!

I hope you enjoy it as much as I will.

Hope to see you all out there.
Over and out,
Keith (the intern)
We fixed location issues when trying to pay on your latest devices in this version, thanks for letting us know of the issue. Hope you enjoy eating out with Liven!
We've listened to your feedback and this version adds filters for your city when choosing a restaurant package, and with that, we've also launch in Perth!

We squashed some bugs and made some small improvements around packages in this version! With easier ways to find and use packages for your favourite restaurants.
We thank you for your feedback. You can find the feedback screen in the profile section of the app, looking forward to hearing more of your suggestions!

Ahoy Liveneers! Welcome to the Snaxmas app release notes, my name is Keith (the intern) and I will be your host this evening.

If you didn't know already, Snaxmas is truly the foodies holiday period. Our partners are giving you up to 100% bonus on a whole range of Care Packages. The Snaxmas period will run for 12 days, with new featured partners every. single. day.

So get ready, Snaxmas starts on the 14th of December!

Just like Santa's Elves, the Liven Team has been working hard to bring you joy, and deliver you some top quality packages over the Snaxmas period. The following changes have been made to help you find these Care Packages easier:
- A Snaxmas banner on the home screen that will take you to these packages
- Snaxmas theme on packages that offer the increased bonuses! Just look for the presents ;)

On behalf of the Liven Team, I wish you a Merry Snaxmas.
Keith (the intern)
We've made some improvements and squashed some bugs in this version!
We fixed a critical issue in this version that caused some users to crash on launch.

Like any good restaurant, we cleaned up some bugs in this version:
- Fixed promo code and referral links
- Fixed suggesting a restaurant
- Fixed a crash

Thank you for dining in with us and reporting the issues you find!

Preference Centre
Wish you could opt-out of those "you up?" messages from an old flame you used to dine at on Liven? Or even opt-in to hear from a new cute restaurant in your neighbourhood? Now you can in your profile section of the app.

Ahoy Liveneers! It's Keith (the intern) here with another fresh round of releases. With the most collaborative effort since r/wallstreetbets, the Liven Engineering has brought you a real treat this time around.

Merchant Screen
When a fire release like this comes out, you have no choice but to Stop, Drop and Scroll. Our new merchant screen lets you scroll down to see more info about your venue, and makes paying easier. We also have added a story reel to better showcase photos.

Preference Centre
Wish you could opt-out of those "you up?" messages from an old flame you used to dine at on Liven? Or even opt-in to hear from a new cute restaurant in your neighbourhood? Now you can in your profile section of the app.

We hope you enjoy this saucy drop, and don't be afraid to send us feedback!

Over and out.
Keith
